quizzes.title: Knowledge Quiz: Fear and Flowers

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Clark and Vacation
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, yesterday, jo. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Yesterday, a thief was caught ___-handed.

In the comedy movie Vacation, as the Griswold family finally gets on the road toward their vacation destination, Rusty and Audrey are forced to listen to Clark and Ellen sing classic songs in the car such as Jimmy Crack Corn and I Dont Care and Mockingbird. The children finally resort to their headphones and listen to this 1975 punk rock song to drown out their parents singing.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Blitzkrieg Bop

questions.question: Doc Brown invented a time travel automobile which took Marty back to 1935 in the first Back to the Future movie.
In the movie Vacation, Clark had his first vacation mishap before he even got out of the driveway. What happened to Clark while he was backing out of his garage to begin the journey?

options.text: The luggage from the top rack of the car was knocked to the ground by the garage door.
Clark left Audrey at home alone by mistake.
The car wouldnt start because Clark left the lights on and the battery was dead.
He ran over the neighbors bike.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The luggage from the top rack of the car was knocked to the ground by the garage door.

questions.question: In Vacation, Clark W. Griswold and his family decide to take the Family Truckster station wagon on a fun-filled, family vacation to visit the WallyWorld theme park. Where did the Griswolds begin their journey?

In the 1983 movie Vacation, The Griswolds get lost and run into trouble in this mid-western city. When trying to ask a very helpful gentleman for directions, the hubcaps are stolen from the Family Truckster while Clark and his family are still in the car.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: St. Louis

questions.question: Actress Wendie Jo Sperber, which played Linda McFly in the Back to the Future movies, passed away from lung cancer in 2006.
What year did the first Back To The Future movie come out?

In the comedy movie Vacation, while Clark is traveling to WallyWorld, he is pulled over by a very disgruntled police officer. The police officer forces Clark out of the car and gives him a stern lecture, but it wasnt for speeding or drunk driving. Why was the police officer so upset at Clark?

options.text: he travelled with a dead body in the car.
He nearly ran an elderly couple off the road.
He failed to stop for a police officer.
He dragged a dog tied to the rear bumper.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: He dragged a dog tied to the rear bumper.

questions.question: Martys brother was played by Marc McClure in the Back to the Future movies part 1 and 3.
What was the name of the bully always causing problems for Marty and George McFly in the Back to the Future movies?

In the comedy movie Vacation, the Griswold family finally reaches WallyWorld, losing a very dear family member along the way. Clark is the first one to the park, but parks in the rear of the lot to beat all of the outgoing traffic at the end of the day. Clark and Rusty sprint from the parked car to the entrance of WallyWorld with this famous music playing in the background.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: theme from Chariots of Fire

questions.question: In the comedy movie Vacation, after visiting with cousin Eddie and his family somewhere in Arizona, the Griswolds are back on their quest for fun at WallyWorld. They decide to take a break from driving and pull over at a rest stop to eat some sandwiches Catherine and Eddie packed for their trip. What was Aunt Ednas response once it was discovered that all of the sandwiches were soaked with urine because the dog wet on the picnic basket?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: she continues eating her sandwich

questions.question: What was Martys mothers maiden name in the Back to the Future movies?
In the Back to the Future movies, Martys girlfriend was Jennifer Parker.

questions.question: During the 80s, British politics were dominated by a system of political views called Thatcherism.  Which of the following statements is wrong about Thatcherism?

options.text: It may be compared with Reaganomics.
Keith Joseph and Milton Friedman are thinkers, commonly associated with it.
It is characterized by a free market economy.
Britains economy fell into stagnation as a result of it.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Britains economy fell into stagnation as a result of it.

questions.question: When I go to the movies once in a blue moon, this is true.

options.text: I very seldom go to the movies.
I go to the movies every day.
I never go to the movies.
I go whenever there is full moon.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: I very seldom go to the movies.
